content.metaTitle: Villa MIR0168-3: Luxury New Build Villa Moraira €1,795,000
content.metaDescription: Exclusive 4-bedroom villa in The White Collection, Moraira. Just 4 minutes from beach, 1018m² plot, private pool. Only 4 villas available from €1,795,000.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0168-3, an architectural masterpiece within The White Collection's exclusive enclave of just four luxury residences in Moraira's prestigious Pinar del Advocat-Cometa district. Positioned merely a 4-minute stroll from Moraira's pristine beaches and vibrant town centre, this exceptional villa represents the pinnacle of contemporary Mediterranean living, where modern sophistication seamlessly blends with traditional Costa Blanca charm.

Set upon a generous 1,018m² south-facing plot, this stunning 229m² villa captures maximum natural light throughout the day while ensuring absolute privacy. The thoughtful design showcases spacious terraces, a private swimming pool, authentic stone detailing, elegant wooden pergolas, and graceful arched nayas, all complemented by meticulously landscaped gardens that create an atmosphere of refined tranquillity where Mediterranean sunsets and sea breezes become part of your daily ritual.

locationSection.intro:
Pinar del Advocat-Cometa represents one of Moraira's most coveted residential areas, offering the perfect balance between peaceful exclusivity and urban convenience. This prestigious neighbourhood sits elevated above the coastline, providing residents with stunning sea views while maintaining easy access to Moraira's golden beaches, award-winning restaurants, and luxury marina. The area is renowned for its upscale villas, mature pine forests, and sophisticated international community.

Moraira itself stands as the jewel of the northern Costa Blanca, consistently ranked among Spain's most desirable coastal destinations. With its picturesque fishing port, crystal-clear waters, and charming old town, Moraira offers a refined alternative to busier resort towns. The exceptional year-round climate, world-class dining scene, and proximity to both Alicante airport (1 hour) and Valencia (1.5 hours) make this location perfect for both permanent residence and luxury investment.
highlights: 4-minute walk to Moraira's pristine El Portet beach and town centre
Elevated position in exclusive Pinar del Advocat with sea views
Close proximity to Moraira's luxury marina and yacht club
Walking distance to Michelin-recommended restaurants and boutique shops
Easy access to championship golf courses at Ifach and La Sella

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0168-3 exemplifies contemporary luxury living with its intelligently designed 229m² of built space featuring four generously proportioned bedrooms and five elegantly appointed bathrooms. The open-plan architecture seamlessly integrates indoor and outdoor living spaces, creating a harmonious flow that maximizes the Mediterranean lifestyle experience.
features: Four spacious bedrooms including master suite with sea views
Five luxury bathrooms with premium fixtures and finishes
Open-plan living areas with floor-to-ceiling windows
Private swimming pool with sun deck and outdoor dining area
South-facing orientation ensuring all-day natural light
Traditional stone details and wooden pergola features
Landscaped Mediterranean gardens with automatic irrigation
Premium kitchen with high-end appliances and island
Covered terraces with authentic arched nayas design

content.investmentSection:
The Costa Blanca luxury property market, particularly in Moraira, continues to demonstrate exceptional resilience and growth potential. With limited new development opportunities due to strict planning regulations, properties in exclusive developments like The White Collection represent increasingly rare investment opportunities. Moraira's rental market consistently achieves some of the highest yields on the Costa Blanca, with luxury villas commanding premium weekly rates of €3,000-€5,000 during peak season, while annual rental returns typically range from 5-7%.

Villa MIR0168-3's unique position within a boutique development of only four properties, combined with its prime location and exceptional specifications, positions it perfectly for both capital appreciation and rental income generation. The growing demand from international buyers seeking luxury coastal properties, coupled with Moraira's established reputation as a premium destination, ensures strong long-term investment potential in this exclusive market segment.

faqs.question: What is the total price and what payment terms are available for Villa MIR0168-3?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0168-3 is priced at €1,795,000. As a new build property, flexible payment terms are typically available including reservation deposits and stage payments during construction. We can arrange a detailed payment schedule to suit your requirements.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for this Moraira villa?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno mortgage specialists who can arrange competitive financing for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of the property value for non-residents, with rates starting from around 3-4% for qualified buyers.

faqs.question: When will Villa MIR0168-3 be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: As a new build property in The White Collection development, completion timelines depend on the current construction phase. We can provide you with detailed completion schedules and progress updates directly from developer Miralbo Urbana S.L.

faqs.question: What makes the Pinar del Advocat location special compared to other Moraira areas?
faqs.answer: Pinar del Advocat-Cometa is one of Moraira's most prestigious residential areas, offering elevated positions with sea views while being just minutes from the beach. The area features upscale villas, mature landscaping, and an exclusive international community while maintaining easy access to all amenities.

faqs.question: What is included in the villa purchase price?
faqs.answer: The purchase price includes the completed villa with premium finishes, landscaped gardens, private swimming pool, and all integrated appliances. Full specifications including fixtures, fittings, and any optional extras can be provided upon request.

faqs.question: What rental income potential does this villa offer?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Moraira typically achieve excellent rental returns, with weekly rates ranging from €3,000-€5,000 in peak season. The exclusive location and high-end specifications of Villa MIR0168-3 position it perfectly for the premium rental market with potential annual yields of 5-7%.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa MIR0168-3?
faqs.answer: We can arrange viewings of the development and show plans, with virtual tours available for international clients. Contact us on +34 634 044 970 or via WhatsApp to schedule your private viewing appointment.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Additional costs typically include Spanish purchase taxes (approximately 10-12% for new builds), legal fees, and notary costs. We provide detailed cost breakdowns including all associated expenses to ensure complete transparency throughout the purchase process.

faqs.question: What makes The White Collection development unique?
faqs.answer: The White Collection is an exclusive boutique development of just 4 luxury villas, each on plots over 1,000m². This rarity ensures exceptional privacy and exclusivity while the south-facing orientation and proximity to Moraira beach create an unmatched lifestyle proposition.

faqs.question: Is this suitable as a permanent residence or holiday home?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0168-3 is perfectly designed for both permanent living and as a luxury holiday retreat. The year-round Mediterranean climate, proximity to international schools, healthcare facilities, and excellent transport links make it ideal for any lifestyle choice.

Contact us today on +34 634 044 970 or via WhatsApp to arrange your private viewing and discover why this extraordinary villa could be your gateway to the ultimate Costa Blanca lifestyle.
